author: amaltaro
body:
This version will bring in a bunch of python library version updates provided in:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8032
in addition to CMSMonitoring and dbs3-client updates as well, provided in:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8036
and
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8040
title: Update WMCore to 2.1.2.pre1
